items.sentence: None of Tom\'s relatives came to his funeral.
Was it hard for you to get in touch with Tom?
Was your father wearing a sweater last night?
He was dropped from the team for using drugs.
Tom might not know what he\'s supposed to do.
Tom doesn\'t think Mary can live without him.
Tom doesn\'t want to talk to Mary ever again.
Tom kept me waiting for more than 30 minutes.
Tom knocked on the door and Mary answered it.
Tom looked like he was getting ready for bed.
Tom looks exactly the same as he always does.
Tom went fishing, but didn\'t catch anything.
The more you have, the more you have to lose.
I haven\'t been busy for these past two days.
I haven\'t spoken to Tom since I left Boston.
Tom asked Mary if she would take his picture.
Tom asked Mary to help him reinstall Windows.
Tom asked Mary to help him with his homework.
Tom promised me he wouldn\'t come here again.
I want a hot shower before I go back to work.
